DOC.brief_summary: This observational study evaluate safety efficacy Tarceva ( erlotinib ) routine clinical practice second-line treatment patient recurrent metastatic non-small dell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) . Data collect patient receive 1 course standard systemic chemotherapy , experience disease progression , receiveingTarceva second-line setting . Patients also follow third-line treatment disease progression Tarceva therapy .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Tarceva ( Erlotinib ) Routine Daily Clinical Practice Second Line Treatment Patients With Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
